programmes.show_description: Adam West High: Brian's campaign to rename the school after Adam West is successful, and he feels compelled to run for mayor. However, he faces competition from Quagmire.
No Giggity, No Doubt: The guys volunteer to chaperone the high school prom, where Quagmire hits it off with Courtney, only to discover she is in fact his daughter.
Pork 'n Feelings: US animated comedy series. Jeff seeks help from a machine that reveals sexual fantasies, and Bullock goes overboard with a spot of decluttering.
Enter Stanman: Stan becomes worried about the content of Francine's dreams - so Roger teaches him how to enter them, but things quickly go awry.
Strong Women: Documentary series. Olivia explores the earning power of strong women, from a bricklayer who has made a million pounds to a bodybuilder in the US.
Bananae: Sitcom set in ancient Rome. Mass immigration from Thrace puts the boys into contact with a sexy Thracian named Irina and a dazzling yellow exotic fruit called the banana.

Art of Darkness: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. Crystal Cove welcomes artist Randy Warsaw, whose latest work comes to life and attacks patrons of the museum.
The Gathering Gloom: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. The Graveyard Ghoul attacks in the middle of Mayor Nettles' Horror Movie Night, forcing the gang to investigate.
Halloween: Animated adventure series. The gang goes trick or treating on Halloween night, but the experience goes wrong when Fred runs into a witch that he met before 11 years ago.
The Curse of Kaniaku: Animated adventure series. The gang meet an ancient monster and try to solve a 700-year-old mystery while on a trip to Japan to visit a friend of Velma.
Matt Edmondson narrates this series about the most entertaining Guinness World Records and the brilliant characters who set them as captured by TV shows around the globe.
Shock Inside The Box: Single guys Connor, Jamie and Tim compete for the affections of receptionist Lacey - which of the three shoppers' fashion choices will earn them a date?
Reality series. Everyone heads to the beach club to celebrate the last day in Cyprus, but Harry is in no mood to celebrate after learning about Junaid's feelings for Joe.
Reality series. Emotions run high after Harry and Joe call time on their relationship, and Jodie makes it clear that Diags needs to spend more time bonding with her son Bear.
Stephen Mulhern welcomes Asiya to the table as she opens the legendary red boxes and hopes to bag herself a fortune by keeping the reds in play and eliminating the blues.
Join Stephen Mulhern as Mark gets his chance to take on the Banker and finds out if his box contains a life-changing amount of money or the 1p lurking inside.
Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Bonnie Langford, Aston Merrygold, and Liza Tarbuck all trying to win a 50,000-pound jackpot for charity.
Graham Norton welcomes firefighter Kerrie, financial advisor Richard, and account manager Ciaran as they tackle tough puzzles and face the Wheel for a chance to win 50,000 pounds.
The show returns with more hopefuls welcomed by the award-winning Ant & Dec before showing their talents to judges Simon Cowell, Amanda Holden, Alesha Dixon and new addition KSI.
More incredible never-before-seen auditions as we meet golden baton twirlers Sunrise Baton, care home worker-turned-magician Craig Roe, and stunning opera singer Emma Nuule.
Smash-hit animated adventure comedy film featuring the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake, 2016. A pair of mismatched Trolls set off on a journey to save their friends.

It's the eve of the 2026 final, and excitement is hitting fever pitch in the Villa - our Islanders are living their best lives with the big climax now just moments away.

programmes.show_name: New: Olivia Attwood: Getting Filthy Rich
programmes.show_description: Dirty Business: From distilling worn pants to erotic audio, Olivia seeks out the latest innovators in the booming sex industry looking for the next gap in the market.
Yacht Rocky: Peter worries when the brewery announce that one member of staff will be fired. Plus, the family go on a rock cruise, but nothing is as it seems.
You Can't Handle the Booth!: Anarchic animated sitcom. The Griffins provide DVD commentary on a recent episode and reveal never-before-told drama between Peter and Lois.
No Weddings and a Funeral: Fed up of the family not respecting him, Klaus leaves. Fifteen years later the Smiths reunite to attend Klaus' funeral - but nothing is as it seems.
Hamerican Dad!: Despite having huge reservations, Stan invites Roger to join his ham club. Meanwhile, Francine plots to frighten Greg.
Till Death Us Do Part: Sitcom. The DNA test results are in for Bob, Cunningham sacks a superintendent, and it's a big day for Paul as he goes undercover.
Saturnalia: Sitcom set in ancient Rome. Marcus hopes that the Roman festival of Saturnalia will provide the perfect backdrop for him to finally woo Cynthia.
Stan's Night Out: Animated series about family man and CIA operative, Stan Smith. A night out with the boys from the office soon runs out of control as Stan and his friends go wild.

Night on Haunted Mountain: Animated adventures. The gang climb Mount Diabla to solve the mystery of a dark-winged angel of destruction and a mysterious Spanish galleon.
Grim Judgment: Animated adventures. The Mystery Inc. gang get involved when a crazed ghostly judge named Hebediah Grimm starts terrorising the youth of Crystal Cove on Lovers' Lane.
Vote Velma: Animated adventure series. The gang decide to run Velma in a small town's mayoral candidate race when the ghost of its founder returns to scare off the other choices.
In Space: Animated adventure series. A very bad parking choice on Fred's part leads the gang to an asteroid mining base in outer space where an alien virus is infecting its crew.
James Lock: TV personality James Lock is given five menus, each of which has been put together by a potential blind date... but who will he want to see for seconds?

programmes.show_name: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programmes.show_description: Reality series. Billie and Greg are keen for Arthur to take up karate, but Greg gets more than he bargained for when he takes on the sensei...
Reality series. Emotions run high after Harry and Joe call time on their relationship, and Jodie makes it clear that Diags needs to spend more time bonding with her son Bear.
Champagne Confessions: US reality series. Marysol hosts a boozy gay brunch, and Guerdy reveals to her girlfriends that she has breast cancer and reaches a breaking point with Larsa.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: A Celebration of Life: US reality series. The women head to Ojai for Annemarie's birthday, and Kyle hosts a celebration of life event for a late friend of hers.
Drue: Drue from Bristol chooses three dates based on the menus they have planned. After the dates are done and dusted, who will he want to see again?
Sharon Gaffka: TV personality Sharon Gaffka is given five menus, each of which has been put together by a potential blind date. Who will she want to see for seconds?
Reality series. Harry is heartbroken and turns to his mum Karen for support, and Joe and Junaid's relationship is blossoming as Junaid makes his feelings very clear.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: A Source of Discontent: Reality show. Gina struggles with a rumour that has been circulating, leading to a confrontation during the ladies' final Amsterdam dinner.
Loose Lips: US reality series set in Florida. When Guerdy confides in Larsa that she has cancer, Larsa decides to repeat the news to her guests at Marcus' welcome home party.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Bitter Pill to Swallow: US reality series. Kyle and Sutton unpack the group's dynamics while planning a trip to Spain, and Erika sets out to rebuild her career.
Stephen Mulhern hosts a special edition of the classic game show with Sally Dynevor, Barney Walsh, and Zoe Williams all trying to guess well-known phrases from the animated clues.
Join Stephen Mulhern as Janet steps up to play her game and take on the Banker to win a fortune.
Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where it doesn't matter if you're not usually good at quizzes because the questions are all about logic and common sense.

programmes.show_name: New: Love Island All Stars: The Live Final
programmes.show_description: Join host Maya Jama for all the drama in the big one - as the curtain falls on the Villa, you choose your favourite couple and decide who will get up to 50,000 pounds.
The Heat: Sneak Peek: A preview of the show that follows a group of ambitious young chefs taking on the hottest job of their lives - working in Barcelona with chef Jean-Christophe Novelli.
Bri-Da: US comedy series. Peter and the guys are fed up with forgetting their lucrative business ideas when out drinking, so they record themselves with Joe's police body cams.
